article_title: Coronavirus: The 31 most underrated TV shows to watch while self-isolating
article_description: On the hunt for a new series to keep you company  Annie Lord  Jacob Stolworthy  Jake Cudsi  Alexandra Pollard  Adam White and Louis Chilton recommend the ones that might have escaped your radar
article_content: You might be excited about the coronavirus quarantine  You might think it will serve as the final push you need to finish reading Crime and Punishment But lets be honest  you wont get past page two  nor will you get through The Odyssey  or polish off the fi   15800 chars
